meaningMnemonic: The <radical>claw</radical> radical and the <kanji>claw</kanji> kanji are exactly the same! Ravishing!
readingMnemonic: You sink your <kanji>claw</kanji>s into anything your two <reading>目</reading> (つめ) see, because you're such a fierce predator. If your two 目 can see it, your claws will get to it. Your claws are basically an extension of your two eyes, that's how skilled you are.
